      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.idt()
      Sets this matrix to the identity matrix
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.inv()
      Inverts this matrix given that the determinant is != 0.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.mul​(Matrix3f m)
      Postmultiplies this matrix with the provided matrix and stores the result in this matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.mulLeft​(Matrix3f m)
      Premultiplies this matrix with the provided matrix and stores the result in this matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.rotate​(float degrees)
      Postmultiplies this matrix with a (counter-clockwise) rotation matrix.

      Postmultiplies this matrix with a (counter-clockwise) rotation matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.scale​(float scaleX, float scaleY)
      Postmultiplies this matrix with a scale matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.scale​(SGVec_2f scale)
      Postmultiplies this matrix with a scale matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.scl​(float scale)
      Scale the matrix in the both the x and y components by the scalar value.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.scl​(SGVec_2f scale)
      Scale this matrix using the x and y components of the vector but leave the rest of the matrix alone.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.scl​(SGVec_3f scale)
      Scale this matrix using the x and y components of the vector but leave the rest of the matrix alone.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.set​(float[] values)
      Sets the matrix to the given matrix as a float array.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.set​(Matrix3f mat)
      Copies the values from the provided matrix to this matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.set​(Matrix4f mat)
      Sets this 3x3 matrix to the top left 3x3 corner of the provided 4x4 matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToRotation​(float degrees)
      Sets this matrix to a rotation matrix that will rotate any vector in counter-clockwise direction around the z-axis.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToRotation​(SGVec_3f axis, float degrees)  
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToRotation​(SGVec_3f axis, float cos, float sin)  
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToRotationRad​(float radians)
      Sets this matrix to a rotation matrix that will rotate any vector in counter-clockwise direction around the z-axis.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToScaling​(float scaleX, float scaleY)
      Sets this matrix to a scaling matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToScaling​(SGVec_2f scale)
      Sets this matrix to a scaling matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToTranslation​(float x, float y)
      Sets this matrix to a translation matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.setToTranslation​(SGVec_2f translation)
      Sets this matrix to a translation matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.translate​(float x, float y)
      Postmultiplies this matrix by a translation matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.translate​(SGVec_2f translation)
      Postmultiplies this matrix by a translation matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.transpose()
      Transposes the current matrix.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.trn​(float x, float y)
      Adds a translational component to the matrix in the 3rd column.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.trn​(SGVec_2f vector)
      Adds a translational component to the matrix in the 3rd column.
      Matrix3f Matrix3f.trn​(SGVec_3f vector)
      Adds a translational component to the matrix in the 3rd column.
